data.meta_description: Interested in applying to OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College? This is the complete guide to getting accepted into OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College. Yes, there is stiff competition and thousands of other applicants, but we’ll delve into the minimum requirements you need to get and then tricks that help your application stand out from the rest.
data.text:
Oklahoma Christian University: 2024 Requirements, Scores & GPAs

This is the go-to guide for getting into Oklahoma Christian University. We suggest you read until the end... Not only will we layout the exact GPA and test scores you should aim for when applying to OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College, but we’ll also offer creative ways to help your application stand out from the pack. We breakdown OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College statistics better than any article out there and show you how these have changed over time. Also, make sure to check out Oklahoma Christian University on CampusReel to see what it’s really like here. If you're interesting in transferring to OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College, the read our transfer guide. You can also use the below calculator to help determine your likelihood of acceptance at OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College

What GPA Do You Need To Get Into Oklahoma Christian University?

Oklahoma Christian University’s average GPA is 3.5. Oklahoma Christian University does require GPA. This average GPA means Oklahoma Christian University is very selective. Often times, schools in this range are trying to increase their selectivity and “prestige”. We can’t read the minds of OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College application readers, but they likely want to increase the average GPA from 3.5 to 3.68 this year - to play it safe, we recommend striving for the 3.68 GPA.

*BEFORE CONTINUING PLEASE NOTE: GPA and “prestige” DO NOT mean a college is right for you. Oklahoma Christian University may seem amazing on paper, but you may hate it... That’s why 700,000 students transfer colleges every year - they end up going to the wrong school. It’s crucial to watch the videos on CampusReel and make sure you can envision yourself on OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College’s campus. These OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College admission statistics do not sufficiently tell you what a college or university is like.

What Is Oklahoma Christian University’s Acceptance Rate?

Last year Oklahoma Christian University’s acceptance rate was 59.11. However, check out how the acceptance rate has changed over time.

As you can see, Oklahoma Christian University is getting more and more difficult to get into. If this trend continue it’s likely that OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College will be even more competitive by the time you apply.

Acceptance rate alone does not indicate your likelihood for getting into OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College - it’s a very high level understanding of the true competition. Use the acceptance rate as a general guide for curating a list of 10-15 schools that fall into different ranges of competitiveness. Then, use the below data to get a deeper understanding of how your application will compare to the rest of the pool.

2016 2017 2018 Acceptance Rate 61.0 % 63.0 % 59.11 %

Will You Get Into Oklahoma Christian University?

Calculate Your Chances

Does Oklahoma Christian University Require Test Scores?

Oklahoma Christian University requires that you either take the SAT or ACT. See the table below for how Oklahoma Christian University’s accepted students have performed on both tests. You may be wondering how many test scores should you submit. Generally, don’t freak out about taking the test too often. Industry consensus is that you can submit up to 6 tests as a reasonable limit.

Oklahoma Christian University SAT Requirements

Oklahoma Christian University’s average SAT score is 1080 - this is the sum of the math and reading portions of the SAT (the 1600 scale). Check out the below table for a deeper look into how students performed - it’s also very interesting to look at the average test score over time. The trend over time helps give insight into whether Oklahoma Christian University is getting more or less competitive.

25th Percentile 75th Percentile Average Math 470 600 535 Reading 470 620 545 2019 Total 940 1220 1080 2018 Total - - - 2017 Total - - -

Oklahoma Christian University’s average SAT score is 1080. To be a competitive applicant for Oklahoma Christian University your SAT score should come close to the average. If you’re closer to the 940, you’re likely going to have a tougher time getting accepted. To consider Oklahoma Christian University a “target” school (one that you are likely to get into) you should aim for a score of 1220.

Will You Get Into Oklahoma Christian University?

Calculate Your Chances

Oklahoma Christian University ACT Requirements

Oklahoma Christian University’s average ACT score is 73. To be a competitive applicant for Oklahoma Christian University your ACT score should come close to the average. If you’re closer to the 62, you’re likely going to have a tougher time getting accepted. To consider Oklahoma Christian University a “target” school (one that you have a good chance of getting into) you should aim for a score of 84.

25th Percentile 75th Percentile Average Math 20 27 23 Reading 21 29 25 Writing 21 28 24 2019 Total 62 84 73 2018 Total - - - 2017 Total - - -

Will You Get Into Oklahoma Christian University?

Calculate Your Chances

Oklahoma Christian University Requirements

Now you know where you need to be for getting into Oklahoma Christian University from a grade and test score perspective. Let’s quickly outline what else you’ll need to provide for your application to get reviewed, and then we’ll move onto the most important section: differentiating your app.

Recommendations Status School Rank Required GPA Required School Record Required

How to get into OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College

Follow these steps to maximize your chances of getting into OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College. Everything you read above will help prepare you for what you need to achieve to have a shot at OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College, but these steps will take you even further in applying that knowledge and differentiating your application.

Main Academic Excellence that is in line with OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College admission standards.

1

Score at least a 1080 on the SAT or 73 on the ACT.

2

Maintain a GPA of at least a 3.5.

Join Extracurriculars that Align with OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College’s Values.

1

Join your school band, a sports team or another group activity. If Oklahoma Christian University values music heavily, for example, then try to participate in an organization related to that topic.

2

Volunteer in your hometown. Edmond has tons of ways to be involved beyond just the college. Oklahoma Christian University wants applicants that are also good ambassadors for the school - they want students who will give back to the local community and broader Edmond area in general.

3

Spend your summer doing something that speaks to your values, personal growth, leadership qualities and other less quantifiable characteristics. OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College needs to see past your test scores and grades - they need to know that you will be a valuable and contributing member of their community. You are more than grades and test scores - your experiences should demonstrate that.

Prepare Your Application

1

Write a stellar essay that shows Oklahoma Christian University something they can’t figure out from the other parts of your application. For a detailed guide on writing the best college essay, check this out.

2

Get teacher recs that speak to your character. If you know what you’re majoring in and include that in your OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College app, try to have at least 1 recommendation from a teacher in that department.

3

Apply Before the Deadline. Too many students wait until the last minute to submit their application, and too much can go wrong during this precious time window. Since many students are applying on the last day, it’s possible that OC Oklahoma Christian OCUSA Oklahoma Christian University of Science and Arts OCC Oklahoma Christian College’s own system crashes. Don’t risk the added stress this can cause - submit your app a few days early.
